title: XP-Share in the Jungle
body: I just wanted to ask, if it was intentional that, the Jungle Creeps don't share there XP. For Example: Me and my adc were doing the gromp and just he got the XP.

replies.body:
In case u dont actually speak german:
The jungle creeps do share exp but you must be within a specific range.
for a Duo-bot starting with a jungle camp its important that both of you are in the same range to the creep
both of you as close as possible to be sure.
Otherwise things like this happen :p
If youre premade just try to work things out in a costum game :)

deutsches forum... also schreib deutsch, kein amerikaner wird sich hierhin verlaufen....

und es ist beabsichtig das die exp range gering ist
